pdb18.gui.spatial

Class Enclosure

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Polygon
      • pdb18.gui.spatial.Enclosure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shape, Serializable, MapObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Park

    public class Enclosure
extends Polygon
implements MapObject
    The class represents enclosure in map.
    Author:
    David Bednařík (xbedna62@stud.fit.vutbr.cz)
